info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 12:24AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, eastern Union, southeastern Bergen, southeastern Essex, south central Westchester, Queens, Bronx, Richmond, Kings, New York (Manhattan) and northwestern Nassau Counties through 115 AM EDT... At 1224 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Todt Hill, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newark, Jersey City, Jamaica, Yonkers, Elizabeth, Flatbush, Flushing, Bayonne, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Linden, Coney Island, Secaucus and Harrison. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
